bibl.title: with contributions by Zbigniew T. FIEMA, Clement A. KUEHN, Tiina PUROLA, Tiina RANKINEN, Marjaana VESTERINEN and Marja VIERROS, The Petra Papyri. I.
bibl.note: tabl., figg., 1 carte, plans et 26 pll.

P. Petra I, 1-16. - Foreword (J.F., A.A. and M.L.). - A Selection of Articles and Reports on the Petra Papyri 1993-2002 (Patricia M. BIKAI, M.L. and J.F.). - Bibliography and Abbreviations (T.P.). - Introduction: Historical Context (Z.T.F.); - Archaeological Context of the Petra Papyri (Z.T.F.); - Family of Theodoros (M.L.); - Conservation and Reconstruction (M.L.); - Chronological Systems used in the Petra Papyri (A.A. and Z.T.F.); - Synoptic Chronological Table (A.A. and M.L.). - [Texts] 1-16 [: Private documents from the 6th century]. - Index (T.P.).

series.title: American Center of Oriental Research Publications.

bibl.seg: FRÖSÉN Jaakko, Antti ARJAVA and Marjo LEHTINEN, with contributions by Zbigniew T. FIEMA, Clement A. KUEHN, Tiina PUROLA, Tiina RANKINEN, Marjaana VESTERINEN and Marja VIERROS, The Petra Papyri. I. (American Center of Oriental Research Publications. 4.)
Amman, Jordan, American Center of Oriental Research, 2002, 4°, xx-143 pp., tabl., figg., 1 carte, plans et 26 pll. ISBN 0-90-95654-3. $80.
Frösén Arjava Lehtinen Fiema Kuehn Purola Rankinen Vesterinen Vierros Bikai

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 78 (2003) Nos 155-156, pp. 336-337. - James G. Keenan, BASP 40 (2003) pp. 223-227. - Nico Kruit, BibO 61 (2004) coll. 98-106. - Bernhard Palme, BZ 97 (2004) pp. 579-581. - Denis Feissel, Topoi 12-13 (2005) pp. 797-801. - Nikolaos Gonis, CR N.S., 55 (2005) pp. 655-657. - Gerhard Thür, ZSav 122 (2005) pp. 425-426. - Todd M. Hickey, BASOR 334 (2004) pp. 92-94. - Panayotis A. Yannopoulos, Byzantion 74 (2004) p. 303.
